dsOverview.title: Boulder, CO Daily Temperature and Precipitation Weather Data for January 1897 to December 1977

summary.p: Daily temperature and precipitation data have been assembled from Boulder newspaper weather pages and other available sources to provide a history of Boulder, CO weather from January 1897 to December 1977.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
